message.subject: If you haven't gotten already...start at bottom and read up
message.content:
M1.1. The reason I asked about Chris Sevrens is that he was on the list (you'll see) of this email.
[Inform-AnswerOffline: Kevin asked about Chris because he was on the list of a presumably forwarded email]
M1.2. I don't know if you heard about it but
the author of the email got fired shortly after it circulated through Wall St.
[Inform: author of email got fired a short time after it circulated through Wall Street]
M1.3. Anyway, thought you might find it amusing.
[Inform: sender thought Vince (M?) might find this amusing]
M1.4. Start from
the bottom of this email and work your way up.
[Inform: Vince (M?) should read email from the bottom up]
M1.5. It's interesting to see the path it took to so many people.
[Inform: Kevin thinks it is interesting to see the path it took to reach many people]
M1.6. You'll see Sevrens name
near the bottom.
[Inform: Chris' name is near the bottom]
M1.7. KR
[Conventional: signature]
